title: Whats the deal with lee?
body: Every 10 threads there is a lee sin nerf one.... maybe its just my normals talking here but ive never had a problem with lee..personally...sure a lee escaped form me with 10 hp at one time..or kicked me into a team...other than that no problems....

replies.body: Think of it this way, I play lee quite frequently and I don't think hes op at all.  On a team Lee has one job usually, insec laners....  If he does not due that what good is he?  He steals dragons and gets out alive, has very high mobility, but he is not that powerful in the late game.  How many normal games have you played with a bad lee sin.  He is very hard to master and get good at so that's why his win rate is so low, people say hes bad or op but actually its just the skill level of whoever is playing him.  I think that could go for any champion in the first place.
I agree, there is a lot of anti Lee sin mentality on the boards, because people are like lemmings: one person says Lee is still OP, then another, and soon everyone is saying it all over again.
